description: The image shows two vintage devices, one beige and one dark brown. Both devices have a similar shape, resembling a small, rounded box with ventilation slits on the front. The beige device has a label on it that reads "Zenith 'Guardian Ear & Radio Nurse'." The dark brown device appears to be made of a different material, possibly metal or plastic, and has a more worn appearance. The overall design suggests that these are early models of hearing aids or communication devices.
